marsbars

Class MoistureModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • marsbars.MoistureModel

  • public class MoistureModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model responsible for calculations that are required for the soil moisture sensor and sprinkler control.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAXMOISTURE 
      static int MINMOISTURE

      Returns whether or not the sprinkler has been turned on or off by the sensor system

    • Method Detail

      • setMoistureRange

        public void setMoistureRange(double moistUpper,
                             double moistLower)
        Sets the user desired upper and lower range of soil moisture for the sensor to maintain upto
        Parameters:
        moistUpper - The maximum soil moisture level of the desired soil moisture range
        moistLower - The minimum soil moisture level of the desired soil moisture range

      • setCurrentMoisture

        public void setCurrentMoisture(double currMoist)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the current soil moisture level of the greenhouse
        Parameters:
        currMoist - Soil Moisture level of the greenhouse to set to
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - A custom error that prompts the user if desired humdity is beyond the threshold range.

      • setInternalMoistRate

        public void setInternalMoistRate(double rate)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the current rate at which the sprinkler raises the soil moisture of the greenhouse
        Parameters:
        rate - Rate of increase in soil moisture (%/min)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Prompt the user that soil moisture rate of change can only be positive because there is no device to remove moisture

      • getCurrentMoisture

        public double getCurrentMoisture()
        Returns the current soil moisture of the environment as picked up by the soil moisture sensor
        Returns:
        currentMoisture Current greenhouse soil moisture level

      • getDeviceStatus

        public java.lang.String getDeviceStatus()
        Returns whether or not the sprinkler has been turned on or off by the sensor system
        Returns:
        A message to display on the GUI (On/Off)

      • sensor

        public void sensor()
        This is the sensor method to check the soil moisture level of the greenhouse and update the soil moisture level according to the rate of change that the user has specified. It also controls the sprinkler in order to increase(only) the level of soil moisture to the desired range specified by the user.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Creates a well formated data string so that it can be stored into a simulation save file for retrieval
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
